formatName: Split screen comparison
formatDescription: A split screen format featuring a side-by-side comparison. Each side includes a product close-up with bullet points highlighting features or benefits.

formatName: Vertical product stack
formatDescription: A vertically aligned layout featuring multiple horizontal color bands. Each band includes a close-up image of a product with corresponding text, set against a consistent backdrop. These elements are arranged to highlight different product varieties or options.

formatName: Lifestyle shot and product close-up
formatDescription: A split screen layout featuring a lifestyle shot on one side and a product close-up on the other. The layout integrates promotional text and offer details in a distinct section, creating a balanced emphasis between lifestyle imagery and product-focused information.

formatName: Testimonial block with product
formatDescription: This format features a prominent testimonial expressed in a speech bubble design, accompanied by a combination of product close-up and lifestyle imagery. formatName: Lifestyle shot with numeric feature tags
